caption.title: Parameter estimates and credible intervals for 25 simulations with variable transmission risk ratos.
caption.p:
The red points show true parameter value. The parameter Î² is the per-capita transmission rate, and w 0 and w
h are respectively the transmission risk ratios in the first stage of infection and the high risk group (cf. Eq 12). A-C: Results generated using the QL model. D-F: Results generated using the PL2 model. There is one outlier simulation where the transmission rate parameter could not be estimated precisely and upper bound of the CI was > 70% using both methods.
